name: Enneacraft - Atoriœù.MAR
description:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
Each time a monster(s) is flipped face-up, place 1 Sinquisition Counter on this card. At the end of the Battle Phase, if you have an "Enneacraft" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls with less ATK than this card; destroy it.

[ Monster Effect ] 
FLIP: Change all monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position. Monsters changed to face-down Defense Position by this effect cannot change their battle positions.
You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except in face-down Defense Position. When your opponent activates a card or effect on the field during your turn (Quick Effect): You can change this Set card to face-up Defense Position; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
